attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-1762

Date: 2003-11-05

                     Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l'honorable Robert A. Blair, juge principal régional de la Cour supérieure de justice pour la région de Toronto, soit nommé juge de la Cour d'appel de l'Ontario et juge d'office de la Cour supérieure de justice.

 

 

 


                     The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that the Honourable Robert A. Blair, Regional Senior Judge of the Superior Court of Justice for the Toronto Region, be appointed a Judge of the Court of Appeal for Ontario and a Judge ex officio of the Superior Court of Justice.

Blair, Regional Senior Judge of the Superior Court of Justice for the Toronto Region, be appointed a Judge of the Court of Appeal for Ontario and a Judge ex officio of the Superior Court of Justice.
